Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product truly stands out in its category. We believe it's worth more than $120 to you, considering the benefits it offers. I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
